name: CountDracula(HalloweenCountdown)
0:
”Alexa, Open Count Dracula”
”Alexa, ask Count Dracula how many nights till halloween”
”Alexa, ask Count Dracula how many weeks till halloween”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: count dracula
Developer Terms of Use
des:
You can ask Count Dracula how many days until Halloween and during the month of October you will get some spooky updates from him, Including Jokes and Songs. 

From October 1st - 15th you will get a spooky joke each day.
From October 16th - 31st you will get a spooky update and a song every day.

I hope the skill gets you in the mood for halloween.

Happy Halloween!

Hugo.FM

For More Spooky content Try saying:
"Alexa, Enable Zombie Racing"

Dracula's Halloween Hits Release Date is 13th of October 2022
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
